formattedAddress: 885 West End Ave #2b, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 885 West End Ave #2b, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
A phenomenal teacher that has helped me reverse decades of bad habits in a short period of time. Steven has a breakthrough method unlike any other, based on his many years of research & personal experience.

Virtually no other voice teacher I have ever studied with has been able to demystify the art of breath support with such easy to follow exercises that make this elusive skill solidly within everyone’s reach.  It makes sense that other voice teachers themselves go to Steven, because he is unique and groundbreaking in the field. A+ experience!

originalText.text: Good overall experience and easy to set up consult and preliminary voice lesson. Skilled and experienced teacher and wanted to continue but needed to get finances in order so I did not continue, but I highly recommend. 4 stars only because of pressure to signup for voice lessons asap. I need time to make decisions, being rushed does not help me.

originalText.text:
Now I understand what all my teachers have been saying for years! No one has been able to help me learn how to breathe right for singing. Steven's clear, swift and unique method of teaching the 'BreathingRx for Singers' techniques allow you to truly discover the natural functioning of your instrument first. This has not only provided ease, freedom and better informed action but it makes optimizing skill so much more exciting! I now have a set of tools that I can trust! Thank you Steven Flam!

(Ashleigh Kiven, Actor/Singer/Dancer)

originalText.text: Steven is a deeply intuitive practitioner of a proprietary approach to breath and voice.  While experiencing his gentle bodywork practices, I felt entranced by powerful visuals, and in the days that followed, found my voice instinctively responding to the opening and relaxation he provided.

originalText.text: I felt a good experience, I love how well the teacher learned my body and insecurities to help me immediately!...
